effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
